sections.heading: Exemption from fees, taxes and fines for members of armed forces
sections.text: Section 27-102b. - Credits and exemptions re state licensure and certification requirements for training, schooling or experience while serving as a member of the armed forces.Section 27-102c to 27-102k. - Reserved for future use.
